summary: The Chicks, originally known as the Dixie Chicks, are an American country music band from Texas. Formed in 1989, the group consists of Natalie Maines, Martie Maguire, and Emily Strayer. They gained popularity in the late 1990s with albums like *Wide Open Spaces* and *Fly*. The band faced controversy in 2003 when Maines spoke out against the Iraq War, but they rebounded with the album *Taking the Long Way*. In 2020, they changed their name and released *Gaslighter*. The Chicks have won 13 Grammy Awards and are one of the best-selling country groups of all time.
title: The Chicks
